title: Drawing, "Trees, Tree Tops, and a Wooded Bank, Saddleback, Maine", 1853
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top: Rioble dark; again, at center: light whitish green leaf / stem white, grey / Leaf like Horse Chestnut.
description: Horizontal view of tree tops at upper left and two designs of trees at upper right; across center are tree tops at left, a tree at center, and tree tops at right; and across the bottom margin is a wooded bank.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Trees, Tree Tops, and a Wooded Bank, Saddleback, Maine", 1853.
1853. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-128.
